name: Capcom Combo Pack
description:
Download the Combo Pack, featuring four of Capcom’s hottest PSN titles, and additional DLC content! Get the best action, strategy, puzzle, and fighting games all in one place for just $29.99. Catch the games you missed and give yourself the chance to experience PSN classics. The Combo Pack includes:

• 1942: Joint Strike
• Wolf of the Battlefield™: Commando 3
• Super Puzzle Fighter 2 HD Remix
• Rocketmen: Axis of Evil
• Rocketmen: It Came from Uranus mission pack.
